Title: 3. News Media
Write-Up Text: After scanning through the posts shared by various people we can infer that there have been interesting developments in Australian politics lately. The Federal Treasurer accused the Federal Opposition Leader of being dishonest in his Budget Reply speech while the Federal Shadow Minister for Finance criticised Labor's economic policies. In other news OzHarvest a food rescue organization announced that almost half of the charities it supports cannot cope with the increasing demand for food relief. Finally we learn from one post that there have been recent new developments in Australian politics though no further details were provided.
